text: Aled Roberts (17 May 1962 â€“ 13 February 2022) was a Welsh politician. He was born in Rhosllannerchrugog, Wrexham. He was an elected member of the National Assembly for Wales from 2011 until 2016. He was a member of the Welsh Liberal Democrats party. On 1 April 2019 he was appointed Welsh Language Commissioner by the Welsh Government. Roberts died on 13 February 2022, at the age of 59. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Welsh politicians
